entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Carman

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
